long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to the Clout Faves Chrome extension. After you install Clout Faves, you will be able to track up to 10 of your favorite Bitclout.com users creator coin price by simply adding them to your Clout faves list. 

-Clout faves updates every 1 minute.
-You will see in percentages rather if their creator coin price went u or down.

-Alerts are shown on a pop up window located on the bottom right of your screen if your using Windows or a red badge icon on the Clout Faves icon located on the top tool bar if your using Mac.

Clout faves makes Bitclout.com more personal because its your own list and not some list that puts the spot light on the top users.
